title: Jeeva dhayaka Christhanigey
content:
1 - Jeeva dhayaka Christhanigey

Jeeva dhayaka Christhanigey
Sthuthigeethava kaada banni
Sarva boovasigalelarae
ghaana maanava aarpisiri

Nithya naashadhindha sullu mosadhindha
Nithya kaakuku preethisi rakshisidha
Sathya Christhana kondaaduvey

Papa margadhallu, bogha kaaryadhallu
Paapi munsagalu rairi kaadhihabu
Moksha prapthiya hondhalaari

Yessuva nambadhe hodharae nenagey
Aathma rakshaneyu aa maha bhagya
Thappi gnaya thirpaagurudhu

Nava chethana nava nava jeeva nava
Nava santha sava nava bhava vannu
Baya bhava harana beeduva

title: Bayavenilla santhoshave (Blessed Assurance)
content:
2 - Bayavenilla santhoshave (Blessed Assurance)

Bayavenilla santhoshave
Yessu nannaahma galayane
Swargadha bhagya badya theye
Nanage veentu abha veyay

Idhu yen raga nithya bhagya
Nannalli veentu kalleluah
Yessu yenaathma vadharaka
Swamige stothra nithyagana

Parishudhathma nannalliye
Pavithra shanthi dhayakaney
Yessuvu andha sathayavenna
Thorisikoduva nenathmake

Anandaveshthu niriksheyu
Nannalli thumbi iruvudhu
Yessuvu baruva kaalavanu
Yedhru noodi kaayuvannu

title: Brameyu beda kashtadhoz (God will take care of you)
content:
3 - Brameyu beda kashtadhoz (God will take care of you)

Brameyu beda kashtadhoz
Devaru kaaivanu
Preethei rakhay naaralol
Devaru kaarvanu

Chorus:
Devaru kaaivanu aanughina hadigaloz
Daavuva nishchaya
Devaru kaaivanu

Hrudhaya kundhi hoodharu Devaru kaaivanu
Maargadhoz bhaya vidharu Devaru kaaivanu

Dekadhadhanu kodvanu Devaru kaaivanu
Koduvanendhu nambiru Devaru kaaivanu

title: Yenna thalla beyelaa kristhaa Morey aalisu (Pass me not O gentle Savior)
content:
4 - Yenna thalla beyelaa kristhaa Morey aalisu (Pass me not O gentle Savior)

Yenna thalla beyelaa kristhaa Morey aalisu
Pararanu karey dhaagaa Karey nannannu

Karthaa, karhaa norey aalisu
Pararanu karey dhaagaa Karey nannannu

Ninna Krupaasana vannu Seyri claya shakkey
Olagaagi adda biddhu Krupey beyduvey

Ninna preethi yondharalli Itta nambikkey
Sheymaa samadhaanu shanthi Kodu nannagey

title: Chithe indha bhakthis kundhi koganu
content:
5 - Chithe indha bhakthis kundhi koganu

Chithe indha bhakthis kundhi koganu
Nastha thapathraya kasta kuthallu
Kathanalli thoribandha preethia
Gnapthi maadikodu thiru sthothrava

Christanalli bandha bhagyavu
Bhakthanaadha nina paaligu
Ashtishtendhu lekka maadalu
Ninna kaigallaliyu asadhyavu

Rathna china belli lookadhavaru
Koodi sittu thumba anandha padvaru
Aavu swalpa kaala maathra bharvavu
Yesus kotta bhagya vendhu hogadhu

Yava kashtadhalli neenu bhdharu
Lookadvesha maadi peedi sidharu
Ninna bhagya vendhu hoga laaradhu
Aadhu Christhanalli bhadhra vaag vadhu

title: Devara mundhae prarthaney (Tis the blessed hour of prayer)
content:
6 - Devara mundhae prarthaney (Tis the blessed hour of prayer)

Devara mundhae prarthaney
Maadva kaalavidhu
Deena raaghi illi kuudi beedikolvavu
Dhrudavaadha manasu iralagathyavu
Prarthana sakthi indha
Manastrupthi aaguvudhu

Prarthana kaala Prarthana kaala
Prarthana shakthi indha
Yella maaya vagvudhu

Devara mundhae prarthaney
Maadva kaalavidhu
Pranapriya rakshka samapasthanu
Nammaneegey kaavau vuthara koduvenu
Prarthana sakthi indha
Manashanthi aaguvudhu

Devara mundhae prarthaney
Maadva kaalavidhu
Shodhakana dhurbela vyartha maadalu
Idhu thaka samaya divya sandharbaru
Prarthana sakthi indha
Mahath kaarya vaaggvudhu

title: Idhane gana vaidianu (The great Physician)
content:
7 - Idhane gana vaidianu (The great Physician)

Idhane gana vaidianu
Kataksha illa Yesu
Arogiya maada ballanu
Sukshema illi kellu

Ha impadha svaravey
Athi ramya raagavey
Mudhu mudhu hesarey
Yesu priya Yesu

Nirbaya shanthi koduthey
Kristhesuvina dhiyaanaa
Ananthta parimalavey
Yeeseshtravadha naamaa

Kondadiri samastharey
Yee dhivaya mithra nannu
Arandha pattu manavey
Aradhi sesuvannu

title: Christhanoda nellayu naa kshmave (Anywhere with Jesus)
content:
8 - Christhanoda nellayu naa kshmave (Anywhere with Jesus)

Christhanoda nellayu naa kshmave
Boopraya nadhaliyu naa aathanodanee
Aathanilla dhiralu naananjuve
Christhanerallendhu naa anjenu

Yellelee, yedhendhu anja dhiruve
Christhanoda nerallu naa kshmaru

Christanirallu naanon thigaanella
Mithra renna bitt rendhu aatha bidanu
Aathan kara nannanelli kaayalu
Hadhi yella sthothra poornaa vaagvadhu

title: Kaapaaduvaavaa dhevarey (He leadeth me)
content:
9 - Kaapaaduvaavaa dhevarey (He leadeth me)

Kaapaaduvaavaa dhevarey
Santhosha villa yochaney
Naanelli heygey idharu
Kaapaadu vaavaaa naathanu

Ondhondhu velley dhukkavu
Ondhondhu velley sukkavu
Heygidharu nishchinthayey
Kaapaaduvaavaa naathaney

Yeyneynnu praapthisidharu
Naa gana gutta Ilaarenu
Yaavaa gallu samthrupthaney
Kaapaaduvaavaa naathaney

title: Yella olley dhaanagala (Lord, hear Thee of showers)
content:
10 - Yella olley dhaanagala (Lord, hear Thee of showers)

Yella olley dhaanagala
Moolakartha Dhevarey
Ninna dhivya aashirvaadha
Dhaya maadu nanagey

Nanagey, nanagey
Dhaya maadu nanagey

Paapi yaagi dheney havudhu
Yogyanalla dhandhayey
Kristhagagi shamey yannu
Dhaya maadu nanagey

Ninna meyley bhara vasey
Ittidhene Yesuve
Ninna sthiraa samadhaana
Dhaya maadu nanagey

title: Aacharya ratchakha naa Dhesuve (A wonderful Savior)
content:
11 - Aacharya ratchakha naa Dhesuve (A wonderful Savior)

Aacharya ratchakha naa Dhesuve
Aacharya Mesiya Natha
Nin aathmaavaa bandeiyol bailiduve
Ananadha nee vaasu dhozhu

Bailuduvenu bande seelolage
Ye nirasaa bhuviyelu
Bailuduvenu aathana preethi elli
Than krupaiya hastha dhozhu
Than krupaiya hastha dhozhu

Aacharya ratchakha naa Dhesuve
Yen bhaaravaa niluhuva
Aashraya vagine nabi zhenu
